description:
Track and evaluate the performance of your investment portfolio across stocks, cryptocurrencies, and other assets.


- New: Support for the comma as a decimal separator on the Spanish keyboard.
- Improvements to the PDF importers for Arkea Direct Bank, Targo Bank, FlatEx, C24 Bank, Baader Bank, Bondora Capital, DAB, Trade Republic, Scalable Capital, comdirect, Postfinance, WIR Bank, BigBank.
- Improvement: Securities events from today are displayed in the "Future Events" period (as the day is not over yet).
